column5: I forgot I had these pictures on my computer. I know this report is very late, but i thought you guys might enjoy it regardless. All the perch were caught at a private pond on a jig with white twister tail. The largest one was 13"+ and 9" girth.
WOW, huge Perch dude. Congrads on that Perch, they don't come to often(for me at least lol).  Thanks for the report,  MTBF
